books.author: by Gary J. Byrne with Grant M. Schmidt
books.description: A former Secret Service officer claims to have witnessed scandalous behavior by the Clintons.
books.name: CRISIS OF CHARACTER

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary, a major author of the Federalist Papers and an advocate of strong central government. Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Broadway musical.
books.name: ALEXANDER HAMILTON

books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR

books.author: by David Fisher
books.description: Stories of the American Revolution; a companion volume to the Fox News series.
books.name: BILL O'REILLY'S LEGENDS AND LIES: THE PATRIOTS

books.author: by Dick Van Dyke
books.description: A memoir by the performer, who calls himself “a simple song-and-dance man.”
books.name: MY LUCKY LIFE IN AND OUT OF SHOW BUSINESS

books.author: by Lin-Manuel Miranda and Jeremy McCarter
books.description: The libretto of the Grammy-, Tony- and Pulitzer Prize-winning musical, annotated by its creator, along with backstage photos, a production history and interviews with the cast.
books.name: HAMILTON: THE REVOLUTION

books.author: by Angela Duckworth
books.description: A psychologist argues that passion and perseverance are the keys to success.
books.name: GRIT

books.author: by Sebastian Junger
books.description: How modern society’s loss of the sense of belonging — now achieved mostly in the military and in disasters — has led to income inequality, incivility and mental disorders like PTSD.
books.name: TRIBE

books.author: by Eric Bolling
books.description: The Fox News Channel personality describes nine key American virtues that he maintains are under attack by President Obama and Hillary Clinton.
books.name: WAKE UP AMERICA

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Lenny Dykstra
books.description: The center fielder’s memoir describes his life in baseball, business success, struggle with substance abuse, conviction and imprisonment for bankruptcy fraud, and attempt at redemption.
books.name: HOUSE OF NAILS

books.author: by Anderson Cooper and Gloria Vanderbilt
books.description: Mother and son discuss their relationship and difficult family history.
books.name: THE RAINBOW COMES AND GOES

books.author: by Nancy Isenberg
books.description: The role of the white poor in American history.
books.name: WHITE TRASH

books.author: by Mary Roach
books.description: The science that attempts to overcome the challenges soldiers face.
books.name: GRUNT

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Why some people succeed; from the author of "Blink" and "The Tipping Point." Originally published in 2008.
books.name: OUTLIERS
